content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: DeleteImagesForFamily path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/workload/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/images/{image_family} content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name imagefamily
desc an image family
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum delete a familys images
responses
title: 33_Virtual Machine Images_DeleteImagesForFamily_184.json
